dmca.title: [EV1-C2465273G] Copyright infringement

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Sunday, January 07, 2007 11:44 PM
To: DMCA
Subject: [EV1-C2465273G] Copyright infringement

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Copyright infringement
Added by system at Monday, Jan 8 2007 05:41 am

<abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Mon Jan 8 05:41:05 2007

smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830);
  Mon, 8 Jan 2007 05:40:43 -0600
Return-path: <admin@whymarketsturn.com>

helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com)  by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from
admin@whymarketsturn.com)  with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256)
 (Exim)
 id 1H3srr-0002uR-KJ
 for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 08 Jan 2007 05:40:43 -0600
Received: from web81513.mail.mud.yahoo.com ([68.142.199.33])  by
mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from admin@whymarketsturn.com) 
        with smtp (Exim) 
        id 1H3srp-0003Xj-6H 
        for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 08 Jan 2007 05:40:41 -0600

X-YMail-OSG:
KIsfXWcVM1m5jsP9uFlL.N2Ls48OyHaCkWeleIy2B4fkhm9N2KY3U9cV1yPR3Qk2n1f0RbFS
zUQtue_x5tnsHwtB01hfyLhEwZo9xK6oJlWCU1heCLq4jiIqK7bedNm_ZMoLTOPErSg-
Received: from [72.181.40.223] by web81513.mail.mud.yahoo.com via HTTP;
Mon, 08 Jan 2007 03:40:39 PST
X-RocketYMMF: kazmor
Date: Mon, 8 Jan 2007 03:40:39 -0800 (PST)
From: Why Markets Turn <admin@whymarketsturn.com>
Reply-To: admin@whymarketsturn.com
Subject: Copyright infringement
To: abuse@theplanet.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 08 Jan 2007 11:40:43.0479 (UTC)
FILETIME=[D4720670:01C73319] 

MIME element (text/plain)
Zaitek, Inc. 
WhyMarketsTurn.com
1415 S. Voss Road
Suite 110-320
Houston, Texas 77057
281-685-4932 
 
January 08, 2007 
 
 
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.  
1333 North Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas, TX 75207 
 
 
Sent Via: abuse@theplanet.com / First Class Mail 
 
Re: TRADERCD.COM, DNS: WEBHOSTINGOUTSOURCING.COM 
 
Dear Sir: 
 
I am the owner of WhyMarketsTurn.com I have learned of 
an illegal website found at http://www.tradercd.com 
The DNS is WEBHOSTINGOUTSOURCING.COM 
 
ThePlanet.com is the webhost of Tradercd.com. The 
owner of this site tradercd.com has stolen my software 
and has made it available at a fraction of its 
legitimate price.  (See 
http://www.tradercd.com/whymarketsturn.html) 
Apparently this pirate is victimizing 193 companies 
http://www.tradercd.com/full.html 
 
As such, TRADERCD.COM is encouraging and facilitating 
theft and fraud against WhyMarketsTurn.com. This is 
clearly in violation of your own policy as well as 
illegal. As such, I demand that you immediately shut 
down this website and that you provide us with contact 
information for the real registrant of tradercd.com 
pursuant to your customer agreement.  
 
We would also like to see a list of other domain names 
this person has registered with you and those of 
WEBHOSTINGOUTSOURCING.COM so that we can confirm 
whether they also violate WhyMarketsTurn.com's rights. 
 
WhyMarketsTurn insists that this website be shut down 
within 48 hours of receipt of this letter, and that 
you contact me within five days of receipt of this 
letter to provide contact information for the 
registrant of tradercd.com. Thank you for your 
anticipated cooperation in this matter. 
 
Very truly yours, 
 
  
 
Dan Morikawa 
admin@whymarketsturn.com
